query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS sellerApplications (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  applicantName VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  applicantEmail VARCHAR(320) NOT NULL,
  applicantPhone VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
  businessName VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  businessType VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  businessAddress TEXT NOT NULL,
  businessDescription TEXT,
  idDocument TEXT,
  businessLicense TEXT,
  taxCertificate TEXT,
  proofOfAddress TEXT,
  bankName VARCHAR(100),
  bankAccountNumber VARCHAR(50),
  mobileMoneyProvider ENUM('mtn_money', 'orange_money'),
  mobileMoneyNumber VARCHAR(20),
  status ENUM('pending', 'under_review', 'approved', 'rejected', 'requires_info') DEFAULT 'pending' NOT NULL,
  reviewedBy INT,
  reviewedAt TIMESTAMP,
  reviewNotes TEXT,
  rejectionReason TEXT,
  sellerId INT,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  updatedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
)

  reviewedBy INT,

  rejectionReason TEXT,
  sellerId INT,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  updatedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
)
